item.title: CVE-2021-36858|2024-08-04T01:01:59.766Z -- themepoints -- testimonials%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Themepoints Testimonials plugin <= 2.6 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-31348|2024-04-07T17:36:22.725Z -- themepoints -- testimonials
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themepoints Testimonials allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Testimonials: from n/a through 3.0.5.
